name: Doomsday: Hellraiser HD (3D FPS)
description:
Love old school classic 3d shooters? Doomsday: Hellraiser HD for you!

Youtube trailer: http://bit.ly/doomsday-trailer

Doomsday: Hellraiser HD based on community project Freedoom and source code of Doom Classic. Freedoom resources is adapted to iPhone and iPod Touches, you will have more weapons, items and power-ups. All our work will be contributed back to the community.

Features:
- 36 level (4 secret levels)
- 9 weapons: Fist, Pistol, Shotgun, Chaingun, Rocket Launcher, Plasma Gun, Circular saw, Super Shotgun, BFG
- Ability to add friendly dogs who will help fight monsters (go to Options)
- Multiplayer over WiFi: cooperative and deathmatch
- Customizable controls
- 11 amazing soundtracks
- Powered by Doom™ engine (id Tech 1 engine)
- Special enemy: drunk sailor
- Fling Compatible (http://tenonedesign.com/fling.php)

iPhone version also available: http://bit.ly/doomsday-iphone
